records.summary_analyst: CVE-2025-24893 is a vulnerability in Xwiki Xwiki that allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code due to improper input validation in the scripting engine.
records.summary_ciso: CVE-2025-24893 poses a critical risk to Xwiki systems, potentially exposing sensitive data and disrupting operations if not urgently mitigated, highlighting the need for immediate action to safeguard our business integrity and customer trust.
records.description: CVE-2025-24893 is a vulnerability in Xwiki Xwiki that allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code due to improper input validation in the scripting engine.

records.summary_analyst: CVE-2025-2747 affects Kentico Xperience, allowing an attacker to exploit an authentication bypass vulnerability through improper input validation in the login mechanism.
records.summary_ciso: CVE-2025-2747 poses a significant security risk to Kentico Xperience, potentially exposing critical business data and operations to exploitation, making immediate mitigation essential to safeguard our organization’s assets and reputation.
records.description: CVE-2025-2747 affects Kentico Xperience, allowing an attacker to exploit an authentication bypass vulnerability through improper input validation in the login mechanism.

records.summary_analyst: CVE-2025-2746 affects Kentico Xperience, where an attacker can exploit a SQL injection vulnerability within the application’s input handling to execute arbitrary SQL queries on the database.
records.summary_ciso: CVE-2025-2746 presents a significant vulnerability in Kentico Xperience that can lead to unauthorized access to sensitive customer data, exposing the business to potential data breaches, regulatory penalties, and reputational damage, necessitating immediate remediation efforts.
records.description: CVE-2025-2746 affects Kentico Xperience, where an attacker can exploit a SQL injection vulnerability within the application’s input handling to execute arbitrary SQL queries on the database.

records.summary_analyst: CVE-2025-54236 affects Adobe Commerce by allowing an attacker to exploit a stored XSS vulnerability through improperly sanitized user input in customer comments, enabling the execution of arbitrary JavaScript in the context of the logged-in user’s session.
records.summary_ciso: CVE-2025-54236 poses a critical risk to Adobe Commerce, potentially exposing customer data and compromising business operations, necessitating immediate action to mitigate severe financial and reputational damage.
records.description: CVE-2025-54236 affects Adobe Commerce by allowing an attacker to exploit a stored XSS vulnerability through improperly sanitized user input in customer comments, enabling the execution of arbitrary JavaScript in the context of the logged-in user’s session.

news_article.title: Critical Adobe Commerce, Magento vulnerability under attack (CVE-2025-54236)

records.summary_analyst: CVE-2025-54253 affects Adobe Experience Manager Forms by allowing an attacker to exploit improper input validation in the upload functionality, potentially leading to arbitrary file upload and remote code execution.
records.summary_ciso: CVE-2025-54253 poses a critical risk to Adobe Experience Manager Forms, potentially exposing sensitive customer data and compliance violations, necessitating immediate action to mitigate the threat and protect our business reputation.
records.description: CVE-2025-54253 affects Adobe Experience Manager Forms by allowing an attacker to exploit improper input validation in the upload functionality, potentially leading to arbitrary file upload and remote code execution.
